channel.title: CVE Feed for Fedora Project Infrastructure -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fedora Project Infrastructure -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-1002150|2024-08-05T22:08:11.474Z -- fedora%20project%20infrastructure -- python-fedora
item.description: python-fedora 0.8.0 and lower is vulnerable to an open redirect resulting in loss of CSRF protection

item.title: CVE-2017-1002152|2024-08-05T22:08:11.510Z -- fedora%20project%20infrastructure -- bodhi
item.description: Bodhi 2.9.0 and lower is vulnerable to cross-site scripting resulting in code injection caused by incorrect validation of bug titles.
